Follow the schedule provided in your orientation packet  January 30 Global Orientations: Italian Culture and Society - Follow the schedule provided in your orientation packet  January 31   Orientation Continues  January 27 - February 1 Freshmen and other returning academic year students may check in at any time during this period.  February 2 Classes begin  February 6 Classes meet on Monday schedule  February 16 Last day to drop/add courses.  February 23 Last day to drop courses and not receive a "W".  March 6 Last day to declare pass/fail grading option for a course for most students.    March 16 - 20 Spring Break  April 6 Italian Holiday (On Campus Offices Closed)  April 10 Last day to withdraw from a course (with a "W" on transcript).  For Gallatin, NYU Abu Dhabi, and Stern students: Last day to declare pass/fail grading option.  April 17 Italian Immersion Day (Follow your Italian Language Schedule)  May 1 Italian Holiday (On Campus Offices Closed)  May 7 Last day of Classes  May 11 - 14 Final Exams  May 15 All Students Check-out by 12 Noon            *Please note that there will be one additional Tuesday and Wednesday class meeting designated on the syllabus through either a required site visit, field trip, or academic lecture. All calendars are subject to change.          * Please note that all calendars are subject to change.         Back to Top           Fall 2015*   August 24 LSP Freshmen Check-in  August 25 Undergraduate Check-in and Freshmen Convocation  August 26 All-Student Orientation  August 27 Global Orientations: Italian Culture and Society - Follow the schedule provided in your orientation packet             August 28 Global Orientations: Italian Culture and Society - Follow the schedule provided in your orientation packet      August 29 All Student Orientation Continues  August 31 First Day of Classes    September 14 Last day to drop/add courses.  September 21   Last day to drop courses and not receive a "W".  October 2 Last day to declare pass/fail grading option for a course for most students.  October 24 Alumni Day  October 26 - 29   Fall Break  November 6 Last day to withdraw from a course (with a "W" on transcript).  For Gallatin, NYU Abu Dhabi, and Stern students: Last day to declare pass/fail grading option.  November 6 Italian Immersion Day (Follow your Italian Language Schedule)    December 3 Last day of Classes  December 4 First Day of Final Exams (for Tuesday Courses)    December 8 Italian Holiday (On Campus Offices Closed)  December 7, 9, 10   Final Exams Continue (Monday, Wednesday and Thursday)    December 11 All Students Check-out by 12 Noon            *Please note that there will be one additional Tuesday and Wednesday class meeting designated on the syllabus through either a required site visit, field trip, or academic lecture. All calendars are subject to change.          * Please note that all calendars are subject to change. February 1 Classes begin  February 5 Classes meet on Monday schedule  February 15 Last day to drop/add courses.  February 22 Last day to drop courses and not receive a "W".  March 4 Last day to declare pass/fail grading option for a course for most students.  March 14-18 Spring Break  TBA March or April   Italian Immersion Day (Follow your Italian Language Schedule)    March 28   Italian Holiday (On Campus Offices Closed)  April 8 Last day to withdraw from a course (with a "W" on transcript).  For Gallatin, NYU Abu Dhabi, and Stern students: Last day to declare pass/fail grading option.  April 25 Italian Holiday (On Campus Offices Closed)  May 6 Last Day of Classes.  Classes meet on Monday schedule  May 9-12 Final Exams  May 13 All Students Check-out by 12 Noon             Back to Top          *Please note that there will be one additional Tuesday and Wednesday class meeting designated on the syllabus through either a required site visit, field trip, or academic lecture. All calendars are subject to change.          * Please note that all calendars are subject to change. March 14-18 Spring Break  TBA March or April   Italian Immersion Day (Follow your Italian Language Schedule)    March 28   Italian Holiday (On Campus Offices Closed)  April 8 Last day to withdraw from a course (with a "W" on transcript).  For Gallatin, NYU Abu Dhabi, and Stern students: Last day to declare pass/fail grading option.  April 25 Italian Holiday (On Campus Offices Closed)  May 6 Last Day of Classes.  Classes meet on Monday schedule  May 9-12 Final Exams  May 13 All Students Check-out by 12 Noon      * Please note that each semester there will be one additional Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday class meeting designated on the syllabus through either a required site visit, field trip, or academic lecture. All calendars are subject to change.          For information on tuition refund schedules and withdrawal procedures please visit the Policies and Procedures page .
